title: 2024 to be an exciting year for space exploration, and more of today's top videos
text:
Just In
2024 to be an exciting year for space exploration, and more of today's top videos
Why 2024 could be one of the biggest years ever for space exploration, ex-Olympic runner Oscar Pistorius was released from jail on parole, and more of today's top videos.
